title: 'Walas Kata’s' escape attempt foiled
byline: Thilina Sampath alias ’Walas Kata’, a close associate of drug kingpin Kehelbaddara Padme had attempted to flee from police custody and had been arrested again, the Western North Crimes Investigation Division said.

title: Actress Tamannaah Bhatia arrives in Sri Lanka, avoids media at BIA
byline: Popular South Indian actress Tamannaah Bhatia arrived at the Bandaranaike International Airport (BIA) last evening but declined to face the media present at the arrival terminal.

title: 10-hour water cut in Gampaha district tomorrow
byline: The National Water Supply & Drainage Board (NWSDB) has announced that water supply will be suspended in several areas of the Gampaha District tomorrow (11) for 10 hours, from 10.00 a.m. to 8.00 p.m.

title: CAA seizes 3,000 locally assembled gas cookers falsely labeled as foreign-made
byline: The Consumer Affairs Authority (CAA) has seized a stock of 3,000 gas cookers in the Grandpass area that had been imported as parts, assembled locally, and falsely labeled as manufactured in a foreign country.

title: Army denies any involvement in death of youth in Mullaitivu
byline: The Sri Lanka Army has denied any involvement in the death of a young man whose body was recovered from the Muthaiyankattu Tank in Mullaitivu, amid allegations that he was assaulted by soldiers after being called for work near the left bank of the Muthaiyankattu Army camp.
